content.rendered:
• Website templates

Website templates by industry

• Get consultation

Haven't found a template you like?

Don't worry, our team of professional designers will provide other UI repository, or design a new unique UI for you!

Free Consultation

Completed projects

Education

Happy Kids Education – STEM school in the US

Happy Kids Education is a comprehensive STEM education center that helps shape future leaders with passion and excellence. The center offers academic programs including robotics, programming, digital arts, career planning and study abroad consulting for a complete learning experience.

Business

Ngoc Hoa Tailor – Tailor with a long tradition

Ngoc Hoa Tailor is a reputable tailor with a history of more than four decades, starting with Mr. Tran Dac Qua and inherited by his son, Tran Duc Hoa, providing customized tailoring, editing services costumes and provide wedding services.

Education

GE Group – Website consulting for studying abroad in Germany

GE Group is an organization specializing in providing comprehensive education and study abroad services, helping students explore study and career opportunities around the world.

Education

LMS learning management system – GE Group

Learning Management System (LMS) for German language teaching purposes at GE Group Education, implemented using the LMS platform Moodle.

Portfolio

Fullstack Developer Portfolio

Portfolio website for member Huy Nguyen at Item is a place for him to express his personality and experience to impress readers as well as employers.
